item.title: Getting Started Rofi
item.description: Introduction Rofi is a window switcher, run dialog, ssh-launcher and dmenu replacement that started as a clone of simpleswitcher. Installation First, Make sure you have the same (stable) version of rofi installed. On Arch / Arch-based: 1 pacman -S rofi On Debian / Ubuntu: 1 apt-get install rofi On Fedora: 1 dnf install rofi Clone this repository
